revision.text: {{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__ '''{{class|Actor}}''' {{c|native clearscope vector3 '''Vec3To'''(Actor ''other'') const}} == Usage == Gets a 3D vector that points in the direction from the caller to other. This should be used over doing it manually since it will take sector portals into account. This is calculated from the caller's origin (the bottom middle of the Actor) to other's origin. '''Note:''' This vector is ''not'' normalized. To normalize it, append .Unit() to the result. === Parameters === *{{c|Actor '''other'''}} :The Actor to point the vector towards === Return value === Returns a Vector3 pointing towards other with a magnitude matching the distance between the caller and other. == Examples == {{noexamples}} [[Category:ZScript]]
